skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Destroys the target's MAX HP by 30% of the damage dealt. Places a [Shield] buff on this Champion for 2 turns equal to 30% of the damage inflicted if this attack is critical.

skills.desc: Increases the damage inflicted by this Champion equal to the percentage of MAX HP destroyed on the target.
